title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, including the list of design patterns to be covered, desired features, target audience, and any relevant constraints or assumptions. Conduct research and stakeholder interviews to ensure a comprehensive understanding of the project goals and user needs. Additionally, define the project scope, including the platforms and technologies to be used, and any integration requirements with existing systems or third-party services.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including the frontend, backend, and database components, as well as the integration between them.

title: Develop Frontend
description: Implement the user interface and interactive components for the design pattern explorer.

title: Develop Backend
description: Implement the server-side logic, including handling user requests, managing design pattern data, and integrating with the database.

title: Set up Database
description: Design and implement the database schema to store design pattern information and user progress.

title: Implement Design Pattern Exercises
description: Develop coding exercises and examples for each design pattern, along with solutions and explanations.

title: Set up CI/CD Pipeline
description: Configure a continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the application.

title: Write Documentation
description: Create user documentation, including installation guides, usage instructions, and explanations of design patterns.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the application follows best practices for security, including user authentication, data encryption, and input validation.

title: Conduct Testing
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests, to ensure the application's functionality and reliability.
